scripts.package-beta: cd build/firefox; fab package:beta=True; cp latest.xpi ../../; cd ../..
scripts.publish-beta: cd build/firefox; fab publish:beta=True; cp latest.xpi ../../; cd ../..
scripts.publish-pre-release: cd build/firefox; fab publish:beta=False,pre=True; cp latest.xpi ../../; cd ../..
scripts.publish-release: cd build/firefox; fab publish:beta=False,pre=False; cp latest.xpi ../../; cd ../..
scripts.deploy-mobile-release: export CLIQZ_BUILD_ENV=production && ./fern.js build configs/mobile.json && python specific/mobile/deploy-mobile.py -b build/mobile/search -k mobile/extension
scripts.deploy-mobile-beta: export CLIQZ_BUILD_ENV=production && ./fern.js build configs/mobile.json && python specific/mobile/deploy-mobile.py -b build/mobile/search -k mobile/beta
